name: HangmanHero
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hangman hero
des: Looking for a fun and challenging way to pass the time? Our Hangman skill has you covered. With 10 different categories of words to choose from, or the option for a random word, you can play as many games as you like. And with support for English, Spanish, French, and German, there's something for everyone. Just ask Alexa to open Hangman and start playing today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
